title: Game Freezes Randomly
body:
Hi Riot Team, 

My game is recently freezing a lot and honestly I do not why since my drivers are all up to date. In the last game it froze 3 times, I was only able to see a gray screen, I was able to hear the sound of the game I couldnt do anything, I had to restart the computer the 3 times, any advise?

replies.body: That sucks, and I want to help!  Are you on Windows 10?  This freezing could be caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) bar, which has been known to cause freezing like this.  Let me know if disabling that helps.
Hey, thanks for replying! No, I am using Windows 8 so far, it just happen twice in my last game... I definetely cannot keep playing like this

Thanks for this info.  There might be other driver or hardware issues causing a snag in this case.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up, but be sure to test it in a custom game so you don't get any penalties.

I already did that with absolutely no luck, I know that you have a troubleshooting process to follow and I know how it works, believe, I need an expert advise, I am attaching all game logs that could be needed to dig into the problem, I got freezed in the last games, so R3D logs maybe can tell something. https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B73TlDr0Igt0U0NyX3BOSm1LS1k

Grab these logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for us.  Our tech team will be able to review the context and work with you directly towards a resolution.  We'll see you there!
